titles.title: A concurrent resolution commending the Government of the Republic of Colombia for the extradition of Carlos Enrique Lehder.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Western Hemisphere Affairs.

bill.summary: 3/26/1987--Introduced. Declares that the Congress: (1) extends its appreciation to President Virgilio Barco and the Colombian people for their courage in apprehending Carlos Lehder, leader of Colombian drug groups, and extraditing him to the United States; (2) recognizes the difficulties of the Government in reaching this decision; and (3) reaffirms its intention to work with President Barco in eradicating drugs from both countries.
